text: Maksim Vitalyevich Ishkeldin (; born 22 June 1990) is a Russian professional bandy player. He has been playing for the Khabarovsk SKA-Neftyanik since 2015, previously for the Novosibirsk Sibselmash (2006—2010) and the Krasnogorsk Zorky (2010-2015) and has been part of the Russia national bandy team in world championship competitions.Rusbandy: Maxim Ishkeldin (in Russian), seen 17 July 2016 After the 2017-18 season he was elected the best player in the Russian Super League,https://translate.google.co.uk/translate?hl=en&sl;=ru&u;=http://www.rusbandy.ru/news/12008 as well as after the 2018-19 season.MAXIM ISHKELDIN MOST VALUABLE PLAYER IN RUSSIA! ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Russian bandy players Category:Sibselmash players Category:Zorky Krasnogorsk players Category:SKA-Neftyanik players Category:Bandy World Championship-winning players
title: Maksim Ishkeldin
